functions.tag: {CustomModelData:1,display:{Name:'{"translate":"豊穣の妖鍬","color":"#A2FF00","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['[{"text":"❖ ","color":"","italic":false},{"translate":"%1$s%2$s(III)","color":"white","with":[{"translate":"因果の"},{"translate":"刻印"}]}]','{"translate":"幸運が付与された妖鍬。","color":"#FFC800","italic":false}','{"translate":"とある伝承に幸運が付いた道具で作物や植物を掘ると","color":"#FFC800","italic":false}','{"translate":"変わった作物が収穫できたと言い伝えられている","color":"#FFC800","italic":false}']},Engraving:{EnchantID:"因果",Tier:3},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.max_health",Name:"カスタム",Amount:-0.3d,Operation:2,UUID:[I;11,0,0,12],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"カスタム",Amount:50d,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,0,40],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.5d,Operation:1,UUID:[I;11,0,0,51],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"デフォルト",Amount:3,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,1,50],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
